Description: Lapis lazuli bead in the shape of a star, with a loop for atachment on the back.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tell Dafana, Probably from the North-west Ptolemaic mound
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (p. 73 § 70, p. 111, pl. xli, 38)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.45, p.85-86, p.186, pl.28)
